document_data.name: Matherly Harpell
document_data.mainbody:
'''Matherly Harpell''' was a [[wizard]] who belonged to the [[Harpell]] family and lived in the small town of [[Longsaddle]].

He made a mistake in a magical experiment and ended up becoming petrified. By [[1356 DR]], Matherly was one of the statues of the [[Ivy Mansion]].
